languages.text: {n}Во взгляде Ирлиэт читается сомнение с толикой любопытства.{/n} "Не уверена, что ты полностью осознаешь смысл моих слов. Но если душа твоя ищет гармонии..." {n}Эльдарка закрывает глаза и начинает напевать странную мелодию в чуждом непредсказуемом ритме. Словно рисует голосом узоры.{/n}

{n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Во взгляде Ирлиэт читается сомнение с толикой любопытства.{/n} "Не уверена, что ты полностью осознаешь смысл моих слов. Но если душа твоя ищет гармонии..." {n}Эльдарка закрывает глаза и начинает напевать странную мелодию в чуждом непредсказуемом ритме. Словно рисует голосом узоры.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you with doubt and a glimmer of curiosity.{/n} "I am uncertain if you have fully grasped the meaning behind my words. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody, following a counter-intuitive, unpredictable rhythm. It is as if she is drawing pattern after pattern with her voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous lance un regard empreint d'autant de curiosité que de doute.{/n} « J'ignore si vous comprenez réellement ce que je viens de vous dire, mais si votre âme cherche l'harmonie... » {n}Elle ferme les yeux et commence à fredonner une étrange mélodie. Son chant suit un rythme singulier et imprévisible, comme si elle dessinait des motifs complexes avec sa voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous lance un regard empreint d'autant de curiosité que de doute.{/n} « J'ignore si vous comprenez réellement ce que je viens de vous dire, mais si votre âme cherche l'harmonie... » {n}Elle ferme les yeux et commence à fredonner une étrange mélodie. Son chant suit un rythme singulier et imprévisible, comme si elle dessinait des motifs complexes avec sa voix.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te mira con curiosidad, aunque ves la duda en sus ojos.{/n} «No sé cuánto entiendes realmente de lo que te he contado. Aun así, si tu alma ansía la armonía...». {n}Cierra los ojos y empieza a tararear una melodía peculiar. Sigue un ritmo extraño e impredecible, como si dibujara patrones complejos con la voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te mira con curiosidad, aunque ves la duda en sus ojos.{/n} «No sé cuánto entiendes realmente de lo que te he contado. Aun así, si tu alma ansía la armonía...». {n}Cierra los ojos y empieza a tararear una melodía peculiar. Sigue un ritmo extraño e impredecible, como si dibujara patrones complejos con la voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特好奇地看着你，不过你在她的目光中看到了怀疑之色。{/n}“我刚刚说的那些话，我不确定有多少内容你能真正理解。不过，如果你的灵魂渴求和谐……”{n}她闭上双眼，哼唱起了奇妙的旋律。旋律以某种无法预测的古怪节奏流淌，仿佛她正在用她的声音勾勒出复杂的图案。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特好奇地看着你，不过你在她的目光中看到了怀疑之色。{/n}“我刚刚说的那些话，我不确定有多少内容你能真正理解。不过，如果你的灵魂渴求和谐……”{n}她闭上双眼，哼唱起了奇妙的旋律。旋律以某种无法预测的古怪节奏流淌，仿佛她正在用她的声音勾勒出复杂的图案。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}「ユリエットは興味津々にあなたを見つめた。{/n}私が話したことを、あなたが本当にどれだけ理解しているかは分からない。それでも、あなたの魂が調和を求めるなら…」{n}彼女は目を閉じ、独特のメロディーを口ずさみ始める。まるで声で複雑なパターンを描いているかのような、奇妙で予測不可能なリズムだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「ユリエットは興味津々にあなたを見つめた。{/n}私が話したことを、あなたが本当にどれだけ理解しているかは分からない。それでも、あなたの魂が調和を求めるなら…」{n}彼女は目を閉じ、独特のメロディーを口ずさみ始める。まるで声で複雑なパターンを描いているかのような、奇妙で予測不可能なリズムだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich interessiert an, doch du siehst Zweifel in ihren Augen.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht, wie viel Ihr wirklich verstanden habt. Doch wenn Eure Seele sich nach Harmonie sehnt ..." {n}Sie schließt die Augen und beginnt, eine sonderbare Melodie zu summen. Sie folgt einem merkwürdigen, unberechenbaren Rhythmus, als würde Yrliet mit ihrer Stimme komplizierte Muster zeichnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}

Doch wenn Eure Seele sich nach Harmonie sehnt ..." {n}Sie schließt die Augen und beginnt, eine sonderbare Melodie zu summen. Sie folgt einem merkwürdigen, unberechenbaren Rhythmus, als würde Yrliet mit ihrer Stimme komplizierte Muster zeichnen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana ilgiyle baksa da gözlerindeki şüpheyi görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Sana söylediklerimden ne kadarını tam olarak anlayabildiğini bilmiyorum. Yine de eğer ruhun ahenk arayışındaysa..." {n}Gözlerini kapatıyor ve tuhaf bir melodi mırıldanmaya başlıyor. İlginç ve öngörülemez bir ritme sahip. Sanki sesiyle detaylı desenler çiziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you curiously, though you see doubt in her eyes.{/n} "I do not know how much you truly understand of what I have told you. Still, if your soul seeks harmony..." {n}She closes her eyes and begins to hum a peculiar melody. It follows a strange, unpredictable rhythm as though she is drawing intricate patterns with her voice.{/n}
